title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 § 185.15 - Records retention and disposition schedule LGS-1, 2020; rev. 2022; (Appendix L)

Adopted

New

Amended

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 3/30/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. See Appendix L of this Title. Notes
